titles.title: Medicaid Health Plan Rebate Act of 2005

A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to reduce the costs of prescription drugs for enrollees of medicaid managed care organizations by extending the discounts offered under fee-for-service medicaid to such organizations.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 7/29/2005--Introduced. Medicaid Health Plan Rebate Act of 2005 - Amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to reduce the costs of prescription drugs for enrollees of Medicaid managed care organizations by extending the discounts offered under fee-for-service Medicaid to such organizations.
